responses: Hi there, How can I help?
Welcome to Face Mask Detection System
I look forward to our next meeting
I did not understand, I am just a robot doing my best

patterns: What you can do for me?
responses: I can guide you through the list of names who are involved in this project, prerequisites of the project, uses of Face Mask Detector, and steps to use Face Mask Detector.

patterns: Will you tell me the names of the makers?
Give me the names who involved in this project
Who are involved in this project?
I want to know the names of the makers
responses: Face Mask Detection System is made by Rahul Dhar, Sayantika Chandra, Shuvadip Ghosh, Sneha Das and Sushovan Dey under the mentorship of Prof. Abhijit Sarkar.

patterns: I want to know the prerequisites
What are the prerequisites of Face Mask Detector?
What is needed to make Face Mask Detection System?
Tell me about the technology that is used
Tell me about prerequisites of the project
What are the programmming languages that are used here?
responses: The project requires you to have a good knowledge of Python programmming language, deep learning, and image processing.

patterns: Will you tell me the uses of Face Mask Detector?
I want to know the uses of it

What are the benefits of this work?
Why will I use Face Mask Detection System?
How Face Mask Detector helps us?

Tell me why I use this?
responses: 1. It will be used to detect whether the person is wearing a mask or not

patterns: Will you guide me to tell the steps to follow?
I want to know how to use it
